allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Make health agents fully configurable via database

Migrate from hardcoded agent behavior to database-driven configuration,
enabling dynamic agent management without code changes.

Changes:
- Add useThinkingMode field to control extended reasoning per agent
- Add analysisRole field \(foundation/specialized/none\) for complete analysis workflow
- Add analysisOrder field to define execution sequence
- Remove hardcoded thinking mode check in analyze.ts
- Refactor complete-analysis.ts to dynamically load agents based on role
- Update seed script with new field values for default agents
- Add admin UI controls for new configuration fields
- Generate and apply database migration \(0011_ambitious_shockwave\)

Migration:
ALTER TABLE health_agents:
  - ADD COLUMN use_thinking_mode boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL
  - ADD COLUMN analysis_role varchar\(50\) DEFAULT ''none'' NOT NULL
  - ADD COLUMN analysis_order integer DEFAULT null

Complete Analysis Workflow:
- Foundation agents execute sequentially first \(provide context\)
- Specialized agents execute in parallel after \(add specific insights\)
- Agents with role=''none'' are excluded from complete analysis

EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete dynamic agent system with accordion UI

- Refactored complete analysis to be fully dynamic \(no hardcoded agents\)
- Changed database schema: replaced individual agent columns with analysisIds array
- Added analysisRole \(foundation/specialized/none\) and analysisOrder fields
- Foundation agents execute sequentially, specialized agents in parallel
- Updated all API routes to work with dynamic agents
- Created public /api/agents endpoint for non-admin users
- Replaced tabs navigation with accordion for better UX with long agent names
- Agents displayed in correct order \(foundation first, then specialized\)
- Fixed synthesis validation to allow parameters mentioned as absent
- Updated CLAUDE.md with comprehensive dynamic agent documentation

Database migration: lib/db/migrations/0012_dynamic_agents.sql

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
